amendment.description: Amendment expands the definition of Hispanic serving institutions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 57 in the Congressional Record of April 28, 1998, to broaden the definition of Hispanic-Serving Institutions to include proprietary schools that provide a four year degree program, areregionally accredited, and serve at least 1,500 Hispanic students.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clay amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
